sentence: And I want to thank their counterparts in the House as well:  Representatives DeLauro and Aderholt, Clyburn and Womack, Hoyer and  Joyce, McCollum and Calvert, and Frankel and Diaz-Balart.
McCollum), the distinguished ranking member of the  Defense Subcommittee.

Speaker, I thank Congresswoman Betty McCollum, my co-chair of the  Congressional Burma Caucus and an original cosponsor of this particular  legislation, as well as Representatives Ann Wagner and Seth Moulton,  who helped to make this a truly bipartisan effort.
McCollum), who is the ranking member.
One of them was Wyoming's own Rylee McCollum.
Chair, I rise in strong support of this bill and I  join Chairman Calvert and Ranking Member McCollum in saluting the hard  work of the Defense Subcommittee staff, and of course, Chairman Cole.
